price: Shin fa, waɗanda suka kãfirta sun yi zaton (daidai ne) su riƙi waɗansu bãyĩNa*, majiɓinta baic iNa? Lalle ne, Mun yi tattalin Jahannama ta zama liyãfa ga kãfirai.
arabic: أَفَحَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَن يَتَّخِذُواْ عِبَادِي مِن دُونِيٓ أَوۡلِيَآءَۚ إِنَّآ أَعۡتَدۡنَا جَهَنَّمَ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ نُزُلٗا
footnotes: * Waɗanda suka riƙi wasu bãyin Allah, sunã bauta musu, kamar Yahũdu mãsu bauta wa Uzairu da Nasãra mãsu bautawa Ĩsã da wasu Musulmi mãsu bauta wa wasu sãlihai sun zama kãfirai. Ma'anar bautawar shi ne su ƙirƙira wasu hukunce-hakunce kõ wasu sifõfi waɗanda suka sãɓa wa maganar Alƙur'ãni da Hadĩsi, sa'an nan su jingina su zuwa ga waɗannan bãyin Allah, su bi su da su.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: afaḥasiba alladhīna kafarū an yattakhidhū ʿibādī min dūnī awliyāa innā aʿtadnā jahannama lil'kāfirīna nuzulan
